title: Newcastle, New South Wales
summary: Newcastle (locally /ˈnjuːkɑːsəl/ NEW-kah-səl) metropolitan area is the second most populated area in the Australian state of New South Wales. It includes the Newcastle and Lake Macquarie local government areas.[3] It is the hub of the Greater Newcastle area, which includes most parts of the local government areas of City of Newcastle, City of Lake Macquarie, City of Cessnock, City of Maitland and Port Stephens Council.[4][5]
